full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Standing Offer

**Tender Reference Number:** W689C-220015_B
**Solicitation Number:** WS4071762417
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-25 2:00 PM EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit their bids for a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for General Trades Services.

**Project Overview**

The successful bidder will be required to provide labour, materials, tools, equipment, travel, and expertise to deliver minor repairs and maintenance services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at the following work sites:

* Vimy Ridge Armoury (Lethbridge)
* Patterson Armoury (Medicine Hat)
* Kipp Range (Lethbridge)

The services will be provided on an "as requested" basis.

**Notice of Amendment**

Please note that this tender cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation number WS4071762417 dated 2023-07-07. The new closing date for bid submission is 2023-09-25 at 2:00 PM EDT.

**Key Requirements**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by 2:00 PM EDT on the tender closing date.
* Bids received after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.
* The successful bidder will be issued a Standing Offer for a period of three (3) years with two (2) additional one-year option years.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Victoria Lee, at victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Additional Information**

This RSO is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The successful bidder will be required to meet the specifications and requirements outlined in the Basis of Payment. The DND reserves the right to cancel or modify the tender at any time.

To access the tender files, please visit: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17271943?extsite=MTcyNzE5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
